sources.title: Pickup
sources.description: A lonely widower marries a young woman who resents his frugal ways and hatches a plan to murder him.

sources.title: Pickup (1951)
sources.description: A lonely widower marries a young woman who resents his frugal ways and hatches a plan to murder him.

metadata.Plot: Low-budget, tabloid-lurid story with high camp value of older man falling for much younger beauty who's busy figuring out how she can kill him now that they're married. Nasty verbal encounters and above all, Beverly Michaels, spike up this flick.
metadata.Writer: Hugo Haas, Arnold Lipp, Josef Kopta
metadata.Actors: Hugo Haas, Beverly Michaels, Allan Nixon
